subject: Price Difference for SparkPhone Go and NoiseFree Pro Headphones
body:
Dear David Lee,

Thank you for contacting us regarding the price you paid for the SparkPhone Go and NoiseFree Pro Headphones in order ORD-20250524-1002. I understand your disappointment in finding a much lower price offered by a marketplace seller after your purchase on May 24, 2025.

The SparkPhone Go was purchased for $99.99 and the NoiseFree Pro Headphones for $236.55, totaling $336.54. I understand that finding the same products for a lower price elsewhere can be frustrating. 

While we strive to offer competitive prices, pricing fluctuations can occur. Unfortunately, our price adjustment policy does not extend to price differences found after this amount of time from marketplace sellers.

We appreciate your business and understanding.

Sincerely,
Customer Support

resolution_plan.policy_reasoning: The customer is requesting a price match after finding a lower price from a marketplace seller. POL-PRICE-002 excludes price matching for marketplace sellers.

actions.reason: Price match is denied because the lower price was found on a marketplace seller, which is excluded from our price match policy based on POL-PRICE-002.
actions.details: The price difference found by the customer is from a marketplace seller, and POL-PRICE-002 explicitly excludes marketplace sellers from price matching.
